short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a break from your computer after X minutes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing 'Take a Break,' the extension designed to promote healthier work habits and increase productivity. It allows you to set a custom timer, at the end of which you receive a gentle reminder to rest. You can start, stop, or check the remaining time with just a few clicks. Get 'Take a Break' now and find your balance between work and relaxation for a healthier, more productive lifestyle.
